articles.title: Most distant cosmic jet discovered 13 billion light-years away - CNN
articles.description: It has taken 13 billion years for the light from the powerful jets of a distant object to reach us. These jets are coming from a recently discovered quasar that existed when the universe was only 780 million years old, according to a new study.
